name: XCTestObservationCenter
desc: Provides information about the progress of test runs to registered observers.

items.name: func addTestObserver(XCTestObservation)
items.desc: Registers an object conforming to XCTestObservation as an observer for the current test session.

items.name: func removeTestObserver(XCTestObservation)
items.desc: Unregisters an object conforming to XCTestObservation as an observer for the current test session.
